comments.body: I'd prefer to keep this simple for the alpha. As in, just plop a featuregate check around this line: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/94c5953904f4f365776eb2c61b6b28d95f005d4c/staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/endpoints/filters/audit.go#L123, with the "audit everything" approach inlined.

This made it somewhat simpler to build the policy checker and keep the behavior consistent in the handler. Today passing a nil checker bypasses the handler. I also plan on expanding on this to help with the full event serialization issue. That being said not entirely opposed, just want to be clear about the reasoning
